doc.title: Wedding Dances with Teresa Mason
doc.plot: Acclaimed dance instructor Teresa Mason teaches everything the bride and groom will need to know to dance with style and grace at their wedding. This easy-to-follow program highlights the basic steps needed to make the wedding couple totally confident for their "First Dance." Features five of the most popular dances, including waltz, tango, fox-trot, rumba and cha-cha. The program also includes for the dance with the Father of the Bride, as well as other dance tips for members of the wedding party.
